Sequence Information.Peptide Name: LM5 (Lactomodulin fragment, Synthetic AMPs, XXA, UCLL1c)

Literature.Author: Mousa WK, Shaikh AY, Ghemrawi R, Aldulaimi M, Al Ali A, Sammani N, Khair M, Helal MI, Al-Marzooq F, Oueis E. 2024
Literature.Title: Human microbiome derived synthetic antimicrobial peptides with activity against Gram-negative, Gram-positive, and antibiotic resistant bacteria.

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (42.86%) toSalmocidin 2BG: 20%.Activity: active against S. aureus ATCC 25923 or MRSA BAA 2313 (MIC 1.2-1.4 uM),  C. difficile ATCC 43602 (MIC 2.1 uM), L. monocytogenes ATCC 15313 (MIC 1.8 uM), E. faecium anti-VRE BAA 2317 (MIC 1.9), E. coli ATCC 33694 (MIC 7.8 uM), P.aeruginosa BAA 1744 (NA), and S.enterica ATCC 13314 (NA). NA: not observed.
